filterPhrases.label: Phrase filter
filterPhrases.tooltip: Only count greeting with at least one of these phrases. Seperate phrases with semicolon (;).

filterUsers.label: User filter
filterUsers.tooltip: Similar to the phrase filter but you can filer out users you don't want to be listet (e.g. your bots). Also seperate with semicolon (;).

darkTheme.label: Dark themed
darkTheme.tooltip: Make the window background dark and font bright?

openWindow.label: Open window
openWindow.tooltip: Opens a browser window that shows you the viewers that said hello
